name: Our Power
description:
Our Power is a puzzle platformer made by brandev and nemo_dev for the GMTK 2021 game jam. Play as an adventurer, and join powers with the friends you meet along the way to solve challenging puzzles. Stroll across some plains, wander through a winter wonderland, and chillax in a casino as you collect the stars at the end of each area. 

Controls:

Left + Right Arrow Keys: walk left and right / select friends in menu

Up Arrow Key: open and close  menu

Down Arrow Key: read signs

( X ) / x : use the power of a joined friend!

( O ) / z : pick up a friend / revert to last checkpoint in menu
